power.title: Ambusher's Rage
power.fluff: The ambush drake's throaty roar erupts from your throat as you fling yourself around your wounded enemy in a dizzying set-up for the death blow

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Ambusher's Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You gain combat advantage against the target if it is bloodied.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, you gain the following beneifts:
As a minor action, you can shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to a bloodied enemy.
You count an enemy as being flanked if it is bloodied and at least one ally is adjacent to it.
If you hit a bloodied enemy with a melee attack, all allies consider the enemy flanked as long as you are adjacent to it.

power.title: Ancient Berserkers Rage
power.fluff: You lash out and the spirits of ancestral berserkers roar their approval, anxious to fight beside a member of the clan

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Ancient Berserkers Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You deal additional damage to the target equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If the target was adjacent to you at the start of your current turn, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, at the start of each of your turns, each enemy adjacent to you becomes engaged by ancestral berserkers until the start of your next turn.
While an enemy is engaged, you gain combat advantage against it and gain a power bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Berserking Empath Rage
power.fluff: Your fury is stoked by the injuries suffered by the allies fighting by your side

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Berserking Empath Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each bloodied ally within 5 squares of you.

section.name: Attack:
weapon
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If at least one ally within 5 squares of you is bloodied, you can make the attack against Fortitude instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.
You deal an additional +2 damage for each bloodied ally you can see.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, you gain the following benefits:
When an ally you can see takes damage, you gain a +2 power bonus to your first attack roll before the end of your next turn.

When an ally you can see within 5 squares of you takes damage, you gain a bonus to your first damage roll against the source of that damage. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier and the roll must come before the end of your next turn.
When an ally within 5 squares of you becomes bloodied, you can make a melee basic attack as an immediate reaction.

power.title: Crimson Hurricane Rage
power.fluff: Your swing arcs around you, and rage transforms you into a swirling storm of death, dangerous to any enemy near you

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Crimson Hurricane Rage

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You deal damage equal to your Strength modifier to each enemy adjacent to you after resolving this power.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
If you missed the target, it takes a penalty to its first saving throw equal to your Strength modifier.

Until the rage ends, the first time each turn that you hit an enemy with a primal melee power, after the power is resolved you deal damage to each enemy adjacent to you equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Dangerous Presence Rage
power.fluff: You whirl your weapon quickly and decisively, causing enemies within your reach to cower in fear

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Dangerous Presence Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You make the target grant combat advantage until the end of your next turn if you hit.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, enemies grant combat advantage while they are within your reach.
Also, when you hit with a melee attack, the enemy grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Both of these are Fear effects.

power.title: Earth Grasp Rage
power.fluff: Your rage reaches out to Stone Brother, and arms of molten stone form to grab your foes

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Earth Grasp Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You restrain the target instead of immobilizing it.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is caught in molten stone (save ends).
While it is caught, the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage and is immobilized.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is knocked prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Until the rage ends, your primal attacks against immobilized, restrained, or prone targets deal an additional 5 fire damage.
Also, your primal powers that immobilize, restrain, grab or knock the target prone also cause the target to take ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends) and gain the Fire keyword.

power.title: Frost Wolf Rage
power.fluff: Like the great spirit wolf whose breath is the cold North wind, you are wreathed in frost that chills those who try to harm you

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Frost Wolf Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you deal 3 + your Constitution modifier cold damage to any enemy that targets you with a melee attack after that attack has been resolved.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one enemy within your weapon reach. The chosen enemy can make a melee basic attack against you as a free interrupt.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If the target made the attack against you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll
If the target's attack scored a critical hit against you, you gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll instead and your attack scores a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier cold damage.
If the target made the attack against you, you deal an additional +1[W] cold damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, you deal 3 + your Constitution modifier cold damage to any enemy that targets you with a melee attack after that attack has been resolved.
If the enemy scores a critical hit against you, the damage increases by +5.

power.title: Longstrike Slayer Rage
power.fluff: Your weapon smashes into your targets like a steel hurricane as your fury enhances its leverage and power

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Longstrike Slayer Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You deal additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier against targets that are not adjacent to you.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst you can see

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst you can see
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You take a -5 penalty to attack rolls against targets adjacent to you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, you gain a bonus to melee and close Weapon damage rolls against targets that are 2 or more squares away from you. The bonus equals your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Rumbling Earth Rage
power.fluff: The ground shakes and the air splits - you can barely hear the voices of your friends asking you to call on a different primal spirit to drive your rage

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Rumbling Earth Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You deal thunder damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier to all creatures within 5 squares of you each time time an attack hits you before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You knock the target prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, you activate an Aura 5 (Primal, Thunder).
whenever an attack hits you, you deal thunder damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier to all creatures in the aura.

If an attack scores a critical hit against you, the thunder damage increases by +5 and you must knock prone the creature closest to you that you deal the damage to. If more than one creature is equally close, you choose which to knock prone.

power.title: Silver Phoenix Rage
power.fluff: Your mighty blow erupts in silver fire as the spirit of the phoenix enters you, granting vitality that surges through you and wards you from death

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Silver Phoenix Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: You regain hit points equal to one-half your healing surge value.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage.
Until the rage ends, you gain regeneration 3. As long as you have at least 1 hit point, you regain 3 hit points at the start of each of your turns.
Once during the rage, you can use the Silver Phoenix Recovery action.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would drop to 0 hit points or less

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge and regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
If you have no healing surges remaining, you regain hit points equal to one-half your healing surge value and the rage ends.

power.title: Thunder Hawk Rage
power.fluff: Your thunderous attack dazes your foe as you channel the great spirit hawk whose wings rumble across the sky

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Thunder Hawk Rage.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: After the power has been resolved, you knock each creature adjacent to you prone.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and until the end of its next turn, the target grants combat advantage and cannot take opportunity or immediate actions.
Until the rage ends, you can use the Thunder Hawk's Screech attack once during each of your turns.

section.name: Screech Attack:
section.target: each creature in the burst or blast
section.text: Constitution +3 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You knock the target prone.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target takes thunder damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Vengeful Storm Rage
power.fluff: Your whirlwind assault engulfs your enemies in lightning as you channel the storm's fury

section.name: Rage:
section.text: You enter Vengeful Storm Rage. The start of turn effect triggers after this attack has been resolved.

section.name: Alternative:
section.text: Each enemy within 2 squares of you takes lightning damage equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier after this attack has been resolved.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
Until the rage ends, you activate an Aura 1 (Lightning, Primal). While you are bloodied, this increases to Aura 2.
At the start of each of your turns, each enemy in the aura takes lightning damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.
You also deal this damage when an attack scores a critical hit against you, after the triggering attack has been resolved.
